channel.title: Changing IP
channel.description:
Hey, can anyone tell me how I can change the IP and Port the client is connecting by? I'm running 508, and EGUI.java has 0.0.0.0 for all 3 fields, and right now I don't have anyone to test it with, but anyways I'm planning to host 3 servers on my router, so I'm going to have to use 3 ports, and I'm making an app with vb to change it with 1 click, the problem being, I don't know what to change exactly. Thanks, DJ.
/Never mind, sorry :P
